content.raw:
never mind! I have new faith after setting the solver tolerance so that it won't use all the iterations if it doesn't need to

ODE iteratively solves each group of disconnected bodies (known internally as "islands") separately. I've set the tolerance as a parameter in the world file in fe6e41b so that the robot will still use all the iterations, but the other models will finish stop without using all 300 iterations. Currently we can't set the tolerance on a per-model basis, so we have to pick one value that works well for all the models. We can explore setting the tolerance at a higher value if desired.
